email.title: Bloomberg Bpuzzled London Qualifiers
email.text:
Hi everyone!
Bloomberg got in touch with us to share a brand new competition they are hosting in their London office called Bpuzzled! It's a great opportunity to put one's problem solving skills to a challenge and have fun at the same time. The event will take place **on Saturday 26th October from 12:00 to 16:00** and all participants should **bring a their own laptop**. Food and drinks will be provided.
For more information, check out the PDF attached.
